thread.title: Trump Administration Set to Eliminate Bathroom Protection for Transgender Students
thread.title_full: Trump Administration Set to Eliminate Bathroom Protection for Transgender Students

author: Lauren Camera
title: Trump Administration Set to Eliminate Bathroom Protection for Transgender Students

organizations.name: trump administration set to eliminate bathroom protection for transgender students cancel the trump

text:
Cancel The Trump administration is working to repeal an order put in place under Barack Obama that would require public schools to let transgender students access bathrooms and locker rooms that match their chosen gender identity. (Andrew Harrer-Pool/Getty Images) 
The White House is reportedly moving to end a protection for transgender students by rescinding guidance set by the previous administration that seeks to ensure they have access to a bathroom that matches their gender identity . 
Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos and Attorney General Jeff Sessions are expected to outline such changes in a “Dear Colleague” letter sent to schools as early as Wednesday. RELATED CONTENT
